title: Is something going on with the site...continuing fatal errors
content:
Every search or post today gives me this message:

Fatal error: Can’t open file: ‘watchdog.MYD’. (errno: 145) query: INSERT INTO watchdog (uid, type, message, severity, link, location, hostname, timestamp) VALUES (12014, ‘php’, ‘Can't open file: 'watchdog.MYD'. (errno: 145)\nquery: INSERT INTO watchdog (uid, type, message, severity, link, location, hostname, timestamp) VALUES (12014, 'trip\_search', '1 matches for \"fatal error\". \<a href=\"search?keys=fatal+error\" class=\"active\"\>View results\</a\>', 0, '\<a href=\"trip\_search/fatal error\"\>view results\</a\>', '/search', '208.54.40.206', 1143486993) in /home/httpd/vhosts/typophile.com/httpdocs/cms/includes/database.mysql.inc on line 66.’, 2, ”, ‘/search’, ‘208.54.40.206’, 1143486993) in /home/httpd/vhosts/typophile.com/httpdocs/cms/includes/database.mysql.inc on line 66

(The posts apparently still get posted)
author: fontplayer

comments.content:
The same happening with [me](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519010443/http:/typophile.com/node/18745)…

Have you already try this topic?

[Typophile Beta Bug Report - PLEASE POST YOUR BUGS HERE](http://web.archive.org/web/20060519010443/http:/typophile.com/node/12063)

luck!

e.
